hero.title: Accounting solutions for your business to
hero.subtitle: For over a decade caring for the financial health of companies in Sertãozinho and region. Count on our experience and personalized service.

about.title: About Zetec
about.subtitle: A consolidated accounting firm in Sertãozinho, focused on serving small and medium-sized businesses seeking excellence and trust.
about.story1: Zetec Accounting Services was born with the purpose of offering efficient and accessible accounting solutions for companies of all sizes. Located in the heart of Sertãozinho, our team is made up of qualified professionals constantly updated with changes in Brazilian legislation.
about.story2: Over the years, we have built a solid trajectory based on transparency, commitment and personalized service. Each client is unique, and we work to understand the particularities of your business, offering strategic advice that goes beyond numbers.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Provide excellent accounting solutions, facilitating the sustainable growth of our clients.

values.title: Values
values.description: Transparency, ethics, commitment and personalized service in each project.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Over a decade of operation, always keeping up with fiscal and tax changes.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Partners in your success, helping your business grow with security and organization.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete accounting solutions for companies of all sizes. From simple to complex, we are prepared to serve you.

tax.title: Income Tax
tax.description: Complete Individual and Corporate Income Tax filing with detailed analysis and maximum refund.

opening.title: Company Formation
opening.description: Complete consulting for opening companies, choosing the ideal tax regime and registration with all agencies.

personnel.title: HR Department
personnel.description: Complete payroll management, hiring, terminations, vacations and labor obligations.

fiscal.title: Tax Accounting
fiscal.description: Tax calculation, guide issuance, tax bookkeeping and compliance with all ancillary obligations.

advisory.title: Accounting Advisory
advisory.description: Tax planning, strategic consulting and results analysis for more assertive decisions.

differentials.title: Why choose Zetec?
differentials.subtitle: Differentials that make Zetec the best choice to take care of your business accounting.

personalized.title: Personalized Service
personalized.description: Each client is unique. We understand the particularities of your business and offer tailored solutions.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Clear and direct communication. You will always know what is being done and why.

experience.title: Solid Experience
experience.description: Over 10 years in the market, keeping up with all fiscal and tax changes in the country.

commitment.title: Commitment to Results
commitment.description: Your success is our success. We work so that your company grows with security and organization.

news.title: News and Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest tax, fiscal and labor updates. Information is power for your business.

cta.text: Want to receive our updates directly in your email?

item1.title: Deadline for 2025 Income Tax filing
item1.description: Pay attention to the deadlines and documents required for this year's tax return. Our team is ready to help you.

item2.title: Changes in eSocial for 2025
item2.description: New obligations have come into effect. Learn how Zetec can keep your company in compliance with the new rules.

item3.title: Tax planning: save legally
item3.description: Discover how good tax planning can reduce your company's tax burden without breaking the law.
